name: We Shall Grow Old
description:
A game about the choices of humanity and how the individual can affect the world regarding climate change

In this Game you will learn about how the individual can shape the world through the use of on screen facts and background images.

The player character moves on its own and you will have to be a quick reader to fully understand what is trying to be portrayed.

At the end of the experience you will see one of five endings based on the choices you have made.
